subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The American boat, Team Alvimedica, took the lead in the fifth leg of the Volvo Ocean Race, a nine-month offshore event. The fleet is expected to round Cape Horn on Monday.
snippet: The American boat, Team Alvimedica, took the lead in the fifth leg of the Volvo Ocean Race, a nine-month offshore event. The fleet is expected to round Cape Horn on Monday.
